text: Gossip is an American indie rock band. They started in 1999 in Olympia, Washington as The Gossip. The main singer is Beth Ditto. Brace Paine is the guitarist, Hannah Blilie is the drummer and Heather Schultz is the keyboardist. The band became popular with their third album Standing in the Way of Control (2006). Three singles were released from the album. The first single, "Standing in the Way of Control", reached number seven in the UK Singles Chart. Gossip's fourth album Music for Men was released in 2009 by Columbia Records. Their 2009 single "Heavy Cross" reached number two in Germany's chart. ==Other websites== *Official website ==References== Category:1999 establishments in the United States Category:American rock bands Category:Indie rock bands Category:Musical groups from Washington (state) Category:Olympia, Washington Category:1990s establishments in Washington (state) Category:Musical groups established in 1999
title: Gossip (band)
